description: This course, based on the 2012 CompTIA objectives, helps beginning and prospective IT professionals learn the fundamentals of computer technology configuration, the use of operating systems, computer maintenance, and troubleshooting of hardware, software, and networks. Individuals who successfully complete this course will have the knowledge necessary to meet the requirements of the CompTIA A+ 220-802 certification exam.
title: CompTIA A+: 220-802
